import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { selectItems, updateCartAsync, deleteItemAsync } from "../features/cart/cartSlice"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import React, { useState, Fragment } from "react"; const addresses = [ { name: "Jane Cooper", street: "123 Main St.", city: "Anytown", pincode: "12345", state: "USA", phone: "+1 123-456-7890", }, { name: "John Doe", street: "2345 Main St.", city: "TownAny", pincode: "54321", state: "Canada", phone: "+1 987-654-3210", }, ]; function Checkout() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [open, setOpen] = useState(true); const items = useSelector(selectItems); const totalitems = items.reduce((total, item) => item.quantity + total, 0); const totalAmount = items.reduce( (amount, item) => item.price * item.quantity + amount, 0 ); const handleQuantity = (e, item) => { dispatch(updateCartAsync({ ...item, quantity: +e.target.value })); console.log(e.target.value); }; const handleRemove = (e, id) => { dispatch(deleteItemAsync(id)); }; return (

Personal Information

Use a permanent address where you can receive your order.

Address

Choose From Existing address

    {addresses.map((address) => (

  • Name: {address.name}

    Street: {address.street}

    City: {address.city}

    Postal Code: {address.pincode}

    State: {address.state}

    Phone: {address.phone}

    • ))}

Payment Methods

Choose One

Cart

    {items.map((item) => (

  • {item.title}

    ${item.price}

    {item.brand}

    • ))}

Number of Items in Cart

Items: {totalitems}

Subtotal

${totalAmount}

Shipping and taxes calculated at checkout.

); } export default Checkout;
